name: mymaps_to_geojson
description: A small user script to export data displayed in Google MyMaps as a GeoJSON string

scripts.build: bookmarklet src.js bookmarklet.js && sed -ri "s/<a class=\"btn\" href=\"(.*)\">/<a class=\"btn\" href=\"`cat bookmarklet.js `\">/g" index.html
